鑤字的基本解释

鑤
bào
同“刨2”。

鑤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［páo］
［《集韻》蒲交切，平爻，並。］
“鉋2”的今字。
(1)挖掘；扒。
(2)减去；扣除。参见“刨除”。
[②]［bào］
亦作“鑤1”。
(1)刮平木料、金属等物的工具。
(2)古名曰“準”。今称“刨子”。参见“刨2子”。
(3)用刨子或刨床刮平木料或金属等物。例如，巧木匠刨出的板面平如水面。
(4)以刀等工具削刮。

鑤字的康熙字典解释

暂无。

鑤
Basic explanation of words
鑤
bào
Same as "Plane 2".
鑤
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［páo］
["Ji Yun" Pu Jiao cut, flat line, and. ]
The present word for "Plane 2".
(1) Digging;
(2) Subtract; deduct. See "eliminate".
[②]［bào］
Also known as "鑤1".
(1) Tools for leveling wood, metal, etc.
(2) The ancient name was "quasi". Today it is called "plane". See "Plane 2".
(3) Use a plane or planer to smooth wood or metal. For example, the surface of the board planed by a skilled carpenter is as flat as the surface of water.
(4) Shaving with a knife or other tools.
